Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory683.jpg'}
{3: "The opera house in Constellia sits just a stone's throw from the commercial street, but it's much quieter compared to the lively hustle and bustle of the commercial area."}
{3: 'It seems that most folks are drawn to the lively street, leaving the theater so quiet that hardly anyone comes by on purpose.'}
{3: "Unsure whether to push open the theater's grand door, you hear a familiar voice chime in beside you."}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Might be worth checking out.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'With a graceful curtsy, as always, Selena speaks.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Curious about these, Conductor?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "A Midsummer Night's Dream... A play put together by mechanoids?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You must be familiar with the story, Selena.', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Yes, but... about the stage, I only have some vague memories and impressions left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Feels like there was a past where I, along with you, stood together on a certain stage...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I still remember.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Is all this real? Or just... a glimpse of my past self?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll find out once we step inside.", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Inside?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Of course, the play's about to start.", 3: '28'}
{2: "Aren't you curious about the kind of stories mechanoids might spin?", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Conductor...', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}

{3: 'The night in Constellia remains pristine, the moon casting a shimmering sea of irises in her eyes, as if the journeys of years and the frost of a thousand miles of wilderness were distilled into a single quiver of a flower tip, clear, resilient, and pure.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory683.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory683.jpg'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I get it now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'On stage, we share our stories, our characters mirroring us closely. But how many among the audience truly transcend the performance?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Authors, actors, audience... each one a weaver of stories.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You've been an author, and you've been an actor.", 3: '45'}
{2: "But we've never experienced a play together as mere audiences.", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'As part of the audience, could you and I... craft a new story together, Conductor?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Some stories can't be penned with words, Selena.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Or perhaps, this is the finest way for us to script this story.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Selena reaches for the handle of the theater's grand door."}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I don't know how long this play will go on...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Nor do I know when this night will abruptly conclude, or when it will fade from my memory once more...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'But even this moment alone is sufficient. And the scent of the pansy... once is plenty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We will all remember.', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Yes, I've always had faith in you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'No matter where we find ourselves, that belief remains steadfast, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory684.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory684.jpg'}
{3: 'Reaching out, you find yourself gripping the handrail of the grand door alongside Selena.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Perhaps it's fitting for it to be this serene at this hour. Maybe there won't be any audience.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We are the audience.', 3: '69'}
{3: "Selena falls silent, offering only a serene smile, while the sea of Iris continues to sway gracefully under the moon's gentle glow."}
